group_1.textCenter: (I should start leaving my camera at home.)
(But if I don't have it with me...)
(Guess I'll just go through today's photos@for now, and put them in order...)
(This one shows someone getting bullied.@Wait a second...)
(I thought she was just as upset as I was@that we couldn't stop those jerks before.)
(No, I have to make sure that's what's@happening here.)
(We haven't talked once since she switched@classes.)
(I can't leap to conclusions so quickly.)

group_1.narration: I started gathering evidence by lurking@around her.
Sadly, the evidence I found@did not clear her name...
It proved that she had, in fact, been@complicit in the bullying.

group_1.textCenter: (I thought she of all people would understand@how wrong it is to be a bully.)
(I can't let her keep doing this! I'm her@friend!)

group_1.textRight: Ryo! It's been ages!
I don't think I've talked to you since we@got put in different classes. What's up?

group_1.textLeft: Is it true you're picking on that kid in@your class?

group_1.textRight: What?! Wh-where'd this come from?!
Photos?
Oh no! Wh-when did you take these?!

group_1.textLeft: The first shot was an accident.
I didn't want to believe it, so I looked for@proof of your innocence.
Instead, all I proved was that you really@were joining in with the class bullies...
Remember when we saw them picking on that@other kid and told the teacher?
It sucked so much when they got away with it!
Now you're going around with that same@honor student who spearheaded it all?

group_1.textRight: They'll... They'll pick on me if I don't go@along with them.
You don't get it, Ryo. You aren't in his@class...
There's no knowing what he'll do to you if@you don't do what he says.

group_1.textLeft: That doesn't justify anything you're doing!

group_1.textRight: I know. Of course I know that!
But the students in that gang are really@smart... Teachers trust whatever they say.
Even our homeroom teacher acts like nothing@is wrong, because they're all from Mizuna!
You realized it too, didn't you, Ryo? Back@when we told on them?
It doesn't matter if you tell the truth if no@one's willing to believe you!

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah, that's all true...but back then I@didn't have any hard evidence.

group_1.textRight: It wouldn't have mattered even if you did!
That boy's from Mizuna, and you're from@Daito!

group_1.textLeft: Daito? What's that got to do with it?

group_1.textRight: Can't you tell just from Daito's reputation@and how the adults act?
They'd never believe someone from there!

[chara:800302:cheek_0][chara:800302:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:800302:lipSynch_1]Oh, [chara:800302:lipSynch_0][wait:0.5][chara:800302:cheek_0][chara:800302:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:800302:lipSynch_1]I... I'm sorry, I didn't mean...

group_1.textLeft: So that's what you think, huh? I'm just@"someone from Daito"?

group_1.textRight: R-Ryo, listen, I'm... I'm sorry! Of course@that's not what I really...
Ryo, wait! I swear, I didn't mean...!

group_1.narration: Daito and Kosho Wards are in the east part@of town, and Mizuna and Sankyo Wards are@in the west. I knew relations were bad...
And I'd heard people talk about how those@from the West looked down on us in the East.
But I'd grown up in Daito Ward@and rarely ventured outside of it.
Kamihama's issues felt vague and faraway.@I'd never encountered them in all my time at@Minaminagi Liberty Academy... Until now.
Suddenly hearing this from someone who I@thought was a friend was like being slapped.
It's in the past now, but@words really don't do how I felt justice.
